title: Solidarity By Design: Technology For Organising The Gressroots
description:
Let's have a brainstorm about how technology can help the grassroots and labor organizing. We'll bring out own vision - an app we're making that will have several functionalities we believe to be helpful - but we want this to be a collaborative discussion.
